## useContainerState variable

React hooks that returns the latest state of a [StateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useContainerState: <Container extends StateContainer<any, any, {}>>(container: Container) => UnboxState<Container>
```
